verses.verse: And Adam <S%H121><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> Eve <S%H2332><s%> his wife; <S%H802><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I have gotten <S%H7069><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> from <S%H854><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And she again <S%H3254><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abel. <S%H1893><s%> And Abel <S%H1893><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> a keeper <S%H7462><s%> of sheep, <S%H6629><s%> but Cain <S%H7014><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> a tiller <S%H5647><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>

And in process <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> of time <S%H3117><s%> it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that Cain <S%H7014><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> of the fruit <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Abel, <S%H1893><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> of the firstlings <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1062><s%> of his flock <S%H6629><s%> and of the fat <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2459><s%> thereof. And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had respect <S%H8159><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his offering: <S%H4503><s%>

But unto <S%H413><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his offering <S%H4503><s%> he had not respect. <S%H8159><s%> <S%H3808><s%> And Cain <S%H7014><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> wroth, <S%H2734><s%> and his countenance <S%H6440><s%> fell. <S%H5307><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> art thou wroth? <S%H2734><s%> and why <S%H4100><s%> is thy countenance <S%H6440><s%> fallen? <S%H5307><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou doest well, <S%H3190><s%> shalt thou not <S%H3808><s%> be accepted? <S%H7613><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> thou doest not <S%H3808><s%> well, <S%H3190><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> lieth <S%H7257><s%> at the door. <S%H6607><s%> And unto <S%H413><s%> thee shall be his desire, <S%H8669><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt rule <S%H4910><s%> over him.

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> talked <S%H559><s%> with <S%H413><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%> and it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when they were <S%H1961><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> that Cain <S%H7014><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> him.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> Where <S%H335><s%> is Abel <S%H1893><s%> thy brother? <S%H251><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> Am I <S%H595><s%> my brother's <S%H251><s%> keeper? <S%H8104><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> hast thou done? <S%H6213><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thy brother's <S%H251><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> crieth <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me from <S%H4480><s%> the ground. <S%H127><s%>

And now <S%H6258><s%> art thou <S%H859><s%> cursed <S%H779><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the earth, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath opened <S%H6475><s%> <S%H853><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> thy brother's <S%H251><s%> <S%H853><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from thy hand; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou tillest <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ground, <S%H127><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> henceforth <S%H3254><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> unto thee her strength; <S%H3581><s%> a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> shalt thou be <S%H1961><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>
And Cain <S%H7014><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> My punishment <S%H5771><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> than I can bear. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5375><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> thou hast driven me out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth; <S%H127><s%> and from thy face <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> shall I be hid; <S%H5641><s%> and I shall be <S%H1961><s%> a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> and it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that every one <S%H3605><s%> that findeth <S%H4672><s%> me shall slay <S%H2026><s%> me.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Therefore <S%H3651><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> slayeth <S%H2026><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> vengeance shall be taken <S%H5358><s%> on him sevenfold. <S%H7659><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> a mark <S%H226><s%> upon Cain, <S%H7014><s%> lest <S%H1115><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> finding <S%H4672><s%> him should kill <S%H5221><s%> him.

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Nod, <S%H5113><s%> on the east <S%H6926><s%> of Eden. <S%H5731><s%>

And Cain <S%H7014><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> his wife; <S%H802><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Enoch: <S%H2585><s%> and he built <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1129><s%> a city, <S%H5892><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son, <S%H1121><s%> Enoch. <S%H2585><s%>

And unto Enoch <S%H2585><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Irad: <S%H5897><s%> and Irad <S%H5897><s%> begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Mehujael: <S%H4232><s%> and Mehujael <S%H4232><s%> begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Methusael: <S%H4967><s%> and Methusael <S%H4967><s%> begot <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lamech. <S%H3929><s%>

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> unto him two <S%H8147><s%> wives: <S%H802><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Adah, <S%H5711><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Zillah. <S%H6741><s%>

And Adah <S%H5711><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jabal: <S%H2989><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of such as dwell <S%H3427><s%> in tents, <S%H168><s%> and of such as have cattle. <S%H4735><s%>

And his brother's <S%H251><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Jubal: <S%H3106><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> such as handle <S%H8610><s%> the harp <S%H3658><s%> and organ. <S%H5748><s%>

And Zillah, <S%H6741><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Tubal-cain, <S%H8423><s%> an instructor <S%H3913><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> artificer <S%H2794><s%> in brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron: <S%H1270><s%> and the sister <S%H269><s%> of Tubal-cain <S%H8423><s%> was Naamah. <S%H5279><s%>

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his wives, <S%H802><s%> Adah <S%H5711><s%> and Zillah, <S%H6741><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice; <S%H6963><s%> ye wives <S%H802><s%> of Lamech, <S%H3929><s%> hearken <S%H238><s%> unto my speech: <S%H565><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have slain <S%H2026><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> to my wounding, <S%H6482><s%> and a young man <S%H3206><s%> to my hurt. <S%H2250><s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> shall be avenged <S%H5358><s%> sevenfold, <S%H7659><s%> truly Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and sevenfold. <S%H7651><s%>

And Adam <S%H121><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> again; <S%H5750><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his <S%H853><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> Seth: <S%H8352><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> said she, hath appointed <S%H7896><s%> me another <S%H312><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> instead of <S%H8478><s%> Abel, <S%H1893><s%> whom Cain <S%H7014><s%> slew. <S%H2026><s%>

And to Seth, <S%H8352><s%> to him <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> there was born <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Enos: <S%H583><s%> then <S%H227><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> men to call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
